warning_message: DANGER: Bypassing electrical protection removes fire and shock protection
safe_alternative: Replace fuses with correct amperage rating, have breakers checked by electrician

warning_message: Daisy-chaining power strips causes overheating and is a leading cause of fires
safe_alternative: Use a single heavy-duty power strip, or have additional outlets installed

warning_message: Undersized wire overheats under load and causes fires
safe_alternative: Always use wire gauge rated for the circuit amperage per NEC tables

triggers: don't need to turn off power
warning_message: Working on live electrical circuits causes electrocution and death
safe_alternative: ALWAYS turn off power at breaker and verify with a tester before any electrical work

warning_message: Extension cords as permanent wiring overheat and cause fires
safe_alternative: Have proper outlets installed by licensed electrician

warning_message: Unprotected splices can arc and cause fires
safe_alternative: All wire connections must be in proper junction boxes

warning_message: DANGER: Backfeeding can electrocute utility workers and damage equipment
safe_alternative: Use proper transfer switch installed by licensed electrician

warning_message: Missing GFCI protection in wet locations causes electrocution
safe_alternative: All outlets near water must have GFCI protection
